activities.name: 01a Transform Country Attibutes
activities.description: Placeholder for missing mailing and billing country

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from NO_Building__c 
where Postcode__c = '@{item().Postcode}'
and State__c = '@{item().State}'
and Suburb__c = '@{item().Suburb}'
and Street_Number__c = '@{item().StreetNumber}'
and Street_Name__c = '@{item().StreetName}'
and Name = '@{item().PremiseName}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce

expression.value: @contains(string(activity('Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce').output), 'firstRow')

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce').output.firstrow.Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID

query.value:
Select id from Contact
where Email= '@{activity('Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID').output.firstRow.Email}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce

expression.value: @contains(string(activity('Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce').output), 'firstRow')

query.value: Select id from RecordType where sObjectType = 'Contact' and DeveloperName = 'NO_Assessor'

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce').output.firstRow.Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Company by ABN In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Company Details by Company Id

query.value:
Select id from Account
where NO_ABN__c = '@{activity('Get Company Details by Company Id').output.firstRow.ABN}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Company by ABN In Salesforce

expression.value: @contains(string(activity('Lookup Each Company by ABN In Salesforce').output), 'firstRow')

query.value: Select Id from RecordType where Name = 'Assessor Company'

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Company by ABN In Salesforce').output.firstrow.Id

activities.name: Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select Top 1 * from AssessorsStage where AssessorId = '@{item().AssessorId}'

activities.name: Get Company Details by Company Id

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select Top 1 * from CompanyStage where CompanyId = @{item().CompanyId}

activities.name: If Officer Id is not null or empty

value.value: No Tech Officer found for this Rating header. Ignoring

ifTrueActivities.name: Get Tech Officer Details by Officer Id
Lookup Each Tech Officer by Email In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Tech Officer Details by Officer Id

query.value:
Select id from User
where Email like '%@{activity('Get Tech Officer Details by Officer Id').output.firstrow.Email}%'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Tech Officer by Email In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Tech Officer by Email In Salesforce').output.firstrow.Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Customer by ABN In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from Account
where NO_ABN__c = '@{item().Customer_ABN}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Customer by ABN In Salesforce

expression.value: @contains(string(activity('Lookup Each Customer by ABN In Salesforce').output), 'firstRow')

query.value: Select Id from RecordType where Name = 'Customer / Industry Company'

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Customer by ABN In Salesforce').output.firstrow.Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Customer Contact by Email In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from Contact
where Email = '@{item().Email}'

activities.name: If Customer Contact In Salesforce Exist

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Customer Contact by Email In Salesforce

expression.value: @contains(string(activity('Lookup Each Customer Contact by Email In Salesforce').output), 'firstRow')

query.value: Select Id from RecordType where Name = 'Customer/Industry Contact'

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Customer Contact by Email In Salesforce').output.firstrow.Id

activities.name: Lookup Member by Member Id In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from Contact
where NO_Id_In_Member__c = @{item().member_assessor_id}

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Member by Member Id In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Member by Member Id In Salesforce').output.firstrow.Id

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pDefaultCountry as string ('Australia'),
	pbatch_id as integer (1),
	pActive as string ('Active'),
	pPortalAccess as string ('NABERS Online')
}
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_company_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_company_id as integer,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string,
		sync_status as string,
		account_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupCompany
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer,
		sync_status as string,
		mailing_country as string,
		billing_country as string,
		accredition as string,
		rating_type as string,
		regional_cleaned as string,
		salesforce_contact_type as string,
		salesforce_portal_access as string,
		salesforce_user_active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupAssessor
source(output(
		companyid as integer,
		AssessorId as integer,
		UserId as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Title as string,
		Mailing_StreetNumber as string,
		Mailing_StreetName as string,
		Mailing_Suburb as string,
		Mailing_Postcode as string,
		Mailing_State as string,
		Billing_StreetNumber as string,
		Billing_StreetName as string,
		Billing_Suburb as string,
		Billing_Postcode as string,
		Billing_State as string,
		Phone as string,
		Email as string,
		JoinedDate as timestamp,
		AccreditationDate as timestamp,
		AccreditationExpiryDate as timestamp,
		AccreditationNumber as string,
		EnergyFlag as boolean,
		WaterFlag as boolean,
		WasteFlag as boolean,
		batch_id as integer,
		RequireSupervisionSC as boolean,
		Metropolitan as string,
		Regional as string,
		RetailFlag as integer,
		HospitalFlag as integer,
		HotelFlag as integer,
		OfficeFlag as integer,
		ApartmentBuildingFlag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getStageAssessors
filterAssessorByBatch, filterLookupCompanyByBatch join(getLookupAssessor@member_company_id == getLookupCompany@member_company_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinLookupAssessorCompany
newRequiredColumns alterRow(updateIf(isNull(getLookupAssessor@salesforce_company_id)||length(trim(getLookupAssessor@salesforce_company_id))==0)) ~> updateIfSalesforceCompanyIdIsEmpty
joinStagedAssessors derive(D_DefaultMailingCountry = $pDefaultCountry,
		D_DefaultBillingCountry = $pDefaultCountry,
		D_RatingTypes = iif(true() == EnergyFlag, 'Energy', '')
+ iif(true() == WaterFlag, iif(true() == EnergyFlag, '; Water', 'Water'), ''),
		D_Accredition = iif(1 == RetailFlag, 'Shopping Centre', '')
+ iif(1 == HotelFlag, iif(1 == RetailFlag, '; Hotel', 'Hotel'), '')
+ iif(1 == OfficeFlag, iif(1 == RetailFlag || 1 == HotelFlag, '; Office', 'Office'), '')
+ iif(1 == ApartmentBuildingFlag, iif(1 == RetailFlag || 1 == HotelFlag || 1 == OfficeFlag, '; Apartment Building', 'Apartment Building'), '')
+ iif(1 == HospitalFlag, iif(1 == RetailFlag || 1 == HotelFlag || 1 == OfficeFlag|| 1 == ApartmentBuildingFlag, '; Public Hospital', 'Public Hospital'), ''),
		D_Regional_Cleaned = replace(replace(iif(isNull(Regional), Metropolitan, Regional), ';ACT', ''), 'ACT', ''),
		D_Salesforce_User_Active = $pActive,
		D_Mailing_StreetName = coalesce(Mailing_StreetName, Billing_StreetName),
		D_Portal_Access = $pPortalAccess) ~> newRequiredColumns
getStageAssessors filter(equals(batch_id, $pbatch_id)) ~> filterStageAssessorByBatch
joinLookupAssessorCompany, filterStageAssessorByBatch join(member_assessor_id == AssessorId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinStagedAssessors
newRequiredColumns alterRow(updateIf(equals($pbatch_id,getLookupAssessor@batch_id))) ~> AlterRow1
getLookupCompany filter(equals($pbatch_id, batch_id) && equals(account_type, 'company')) ~> filterLookupCompanyByBatch
getLookupAssessor filter(equals($pbatch_id, batch_id)) ~> filterAssessorByBatch
updateIfSalesforceCompanyIdIsEmpty sink(input(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer,
		sync_status as string,
		mailing_country as string,
		billing_country as string,
		accredition as string,
		rating_type as string,
		regional_cleaned as string,
		salesforce_contact_type as string,
		salesforce_portal_access as string,
		salesforce_user_active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		salesforce_company_id = getLookupCompany@salesforce_company_Id,
		id = getLookupAssessor@id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> targetLookupSalesforceAssessor
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer,
		sync_status as string,
		mailing_country as string,
		billing_country as string,
		accredition as string,
		rating_type as string,
		regional_cleaned as string,
		salesforce_contact_type as string,
		salesforce_portal_access as string,
		salesforce_user_active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		mailing_country = D_DefaultMailingCountry,
		billing_country = D_DefaultBillingCountry,
		rating_type = D_RatingTypes,
		accredition = D_Accredition,
		regional_cleaned = D_Regional_Cleaned,
		id = getLookupAssessor@id,
		salesforce_user_active = D_Salesforce_User_Active,
		salesforce_portal_access = D_Portal_Access
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> updateCleanedData
